alert.note: Alert for Lenawee; Washtenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 4:37PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Monroe, northeastern Lenawee and southern Washtenaw Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 437 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Manchester, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Manchester around 445 PM EDT. Tecumseh around 455 PM EDT. Saline around 505 PM EDT. Milan around 515 PM EDT. Willis around 525 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Pittsfield Township, Azalia, Cone, Whittaker, Macon, Oakville, Bridgewater, Ridgeway, Pleasant Lake and Tipton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
